title: Portfolio - Suresh Gobi
description: This portfolio highlighting a range of projects and skills, demonstrating expertise in coding, problem-solving, and technology-driven solutions.

title: Startup-In-EU
description: Startup-In-EU unfolds as an immersive static website, elegantly presenting a plethora of captivating content.

title: Earth Restoration
description: ER: MERN & Angular app linking inventors-farmers. Showcasing diverse crops via my Angular work. Fosters agri-tech collaboration for sustainable solutions.

title: Belipola Arboretum
description: Belipola Arboretum pioneers analog forests. I built a MERN site with authentication, payments, and features, uniting tech and nature's innovation.

title: Notepad-ReDev
description: Notepad-ReDev is recreation of ordinary notpad with extra features like dark theme, calculator and other tools.

title: Hospital Management System
description: HMS: Web app revolutionizing hospital management. Streamlines operations, empowers staff, manages assets. Secure payments.

title: Ayubo Drive
description: Meet Ayubo Drive: Revolutionizing car rentals. Future-forward, convenient, affordable. Calculate, book, and drive effortlessly. Say hello to travel ease today!
